Description: On I-664 at mile marker 20 in the City of Chesapeake, near 64 interchange, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All south lanes are closed. The south exit 15B is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On US-17 in the County of Essex, in the vicinity of Maryfield Rd; Turnout; Rt. 1215N/S (Essex County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 133 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 266.4 in the City of Hampton, near Hampton River Bridge, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 160.4 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
